solution_line_template: If Rehana is currently {rehana_current_age} years old, she will be {rehana_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{rehana_current_age}+{years_in_future}={rehana_age_in_five_years}>>{rehana_age_in_five_years} in five years.
Rehana will be three times as old as Phoebe in five years, meaning Phoebe will be {rehana_age_in_five_years}/{rehana_phoebe_age_multiplier}={phoebe_age_in_five_years} years old in five years.

{jacob_phoebe_age_fraction} of Phoebe's age now is {jacob_phoebe_age_fraction}*{phoebe_current_age}=<<{jacob_phoebe_age_fraction}*{phoebe_current_age}={jacob_current_age}>>{jacob_current_age} years, which is Jacob's age.
